fullplot: Story of an inventor who, suffering betrayal in life, makes a career of it by becoming a clown whose act consists of getting slapped by all the other clowns. He falls in love with another circus performer, and those who betrayed him enter his life yet again.
plot: A bitter clown endeavors to rescue the young woman he loves from the lecherous count who once betrayed him.
title: He Who Gets Slapped
writers: Leonid Andreyev (adapted from the play by)
Carey Wilson (adapted for the screen by)
Victor Sjèstrèm (adapted for the screen by)
